title: One Piece: Episode of Sorajima
alternative_title: One Piece: Episode of Skypiea, ONE PIECE エピソードオブ空島
description: The special will be the first in the "Episode of" series to cover the Skypeia arc, and will feature a character who did not appear in the original Skypeia arc from the anime.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
